Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities

Interface Capable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Actor, Bottle, Bowser, Bug, CapabilitySet, Coin, Crater, Dirt, Enemy, FireAttack, FireFlower, Floor, Floor, Floor, FlyingKoopa, Fountain, Goomba, Ground, HealthFountain, HighGround, Item, Key, Koopa, Lava, LockedDoor, MartianItem, Mature, PiranhaPlant, Player, Player, Player, PowerFountain, PowerStar, PrincessPeach, Sapling, Sprout, Stick, SuperMushroom, Toad, Tree, Tree, Wall, Wall, WarpPipe, WeaponItem, Wrench
public interface Capable
An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum. A practical alternative to type introspection and other problems.
